scripts.test-docker: pnpm run docker-start && cross-env LIGHTHOUSEURL=https://localhost:8888 cross-env CI=true pnpm run test && pnpm run docker-stop
scripts.docker-start: docker ps --filter "name=lighthouse_test" --filter "status=running" -q > /dev/null || (docker start lighthouse_test || docker run -p 8888:443 -d --restart always --name lighthouse_test ghcr.io/letpeoplework/lighthouse:dev-latest) && wait-on https://localhost:8888
scripts.docker-stop: docker stop lighthouse_test && docker rm lighthouse_test
scripts.docker-screenshots: pnpm run docker-start && cross-env LIGHTHOUSEURL=https://localhost:8888 cross-env CI=true pnpm run screenshots && pnpm run docker-stop
